deleteModal.descriptionBlockedActive: {{name}} has {{itemsCount}} active items and/or {{subCategoriesCount}} sub-categories. You can Disable or Move the category.
deleteModal.descriptionBlockedInactive: {{name}} has {{itemsCount}} active items. You can Soft Delete or Move the category.
deleteModal.descriptionBlockedInactiveSub: {{name}} has {{subCategoriesCount}} sub-categories. You must Move the sub-categories before deletion.
deleteModal.descriptionAllowed: The {{name}} category is empty (there are no items or subcategories), so temporary deletion, and moving it to another category are allowed.
deleteModal.disableDescription: Deactivating keeps the data but hides it from users and prevents any further use.
deleteModal.bulkMoveDescription: Transfer all items and sub-categories to a new parent category before deletion.
deleteModal.softDeleteDescription: Move category to trash. You can restore it later if needed.
deleteModal.hardDeleteDescription: Permanently remove the category and all its data. This action cannot be undone.

restoreModal.title: Restore Category
restoreModal.message: Are you sure you want to restore the category {{name}}? This will reactivate the category to appear in the system again.

deleteModal.softDeleteDescription: Move brand to trash. You can restore it later if needed.
deleteModal.hardDeleteDescription: Permanently remove the brand and all its data. This action cannot be undone.
deleteModal.bulkMoveDescription: Transfer all items to a new category before deletion.

helpers.buyerWins: Funds will be refunded to the buyer and deducted from the seller wallet if needed.

helpers.sellerWins: Held funds will be released to the seller and the dispute will be closed.
